actor_awards.notes: A vibrant MGM musical star of the 1940s and 50s. She famously played her own real-life mother, Flora Parker DeHaven, in the biopic 'Three Little Words'. She received a Star on the Hollywood Walk of Fame for Motion Pictures.

filmography.title: Two Girls and a Sailor
filmography.role_description: A singer who, along with her sister, falls for a wealthy sailor, creating a romantic rivalry.
filmography.plot: Two sisters, both singers, fall for the same sailor, but he only has eyes for one of them.

filmography.title: Summer Stock
filmography.role_description: The aspiring actress sister of a farm owner who brings a theatrical troupe to practice in the family barn.
filmography.plot: A farmer gets more than she bargained for when her actress sister arrives with a stock company to put on a show in the family barn.

filmography.title: Three Little Words
filmography.role_description: DeHaven portrays her own mother, vaudeville performer Flora Parker DeHaven.
filmography.plot: The biography of the songwriting partnership of Bert Kalmar and Harry Ruby.
filmography.awards: Oscar: Nomination – Best Music (Scoring of a Musical Picture)

filmography.title: The Thin Man Goes Home
filmography.role_description: A local small-town girl who becomes a suspect in a murder investigation.
filmography.plot: Nick and Nora Charles visit Nick's parents in a small town and get involved in a murder investigation.

filmography.title: Out to Sea
filmography.role_description: A wealthy widow on a cruise ship who becomes the romantic interest of a con man posing as a dance host.
filmography.plot: Two aging curmudgeons pose as dance hosts on a cruise ship to meet rich women.

filmography.title: Step Lively
filmography.role_description: A singer who is the love interest of a young playwright caught up in a theatrical production scheme.
filmography.plot: A fast-talking producer tries to get his show on stage before the checks bounce, involving a playwright with a great singing voice.

filmography.title: Summer Holiday
filmography.role_description: The teenage sweetheart of the protagonist in this musical adaptation of 'Ah, Wilderness!'.
filmography.plot: A musical slice of life in a small New England town at the turn of the century.

filmography.title: So This Is Paris
filmography.role_description: A French nightclub singer who romances one of three sailors on leave in Paris.
filmography.plot: Three sailors on leave in Paris romance three women while trying to help war orphans.

filmography.title: Best Foot Forward
filmography.role_description: A student at a military academy prom who gets involved in the chaos of a movie star's visit.
filmography.plot: A movie star accepts a cadet's invitation to a dance at a military academy, causing chaos.

filmography.title: The Yellow Cab Man
filmography.role_description: The supportive girlfriend of an accident-prone inventor.
filmography.plot: An accident-prone inventor of unbreakable glass is targeted by a crooked businessman and a doctor.

filmography.title: Scene of the Crime
filmography.role_description: A nightclub singer and gangster's moll who provides key information to the police.
filmography.plot: A detective investigates the murder of a fellow officer, diving into the underworld of bookies and strippers.

filmography.title: I'll Get By
filmography.role_description: A singer and one half of a sister act trying to make it in the music publishing business.
filmography.plot: A song-plugger and a songwriter team up with a sister act to sell their music.
filmography.awards: Oscar: Nomination – Best Music (Scoring of a Musical Picture)

filmography.title: Two Tickets to Broadway
filmography.role_description: A showgirl who befriends a group of hopefuls trying to get on television.
filmography.plot: A group of college students try to get their act on a television show.

filmography.title: The Doctor and the Girl
filmography.role_description: The younger sister of the protagonist who rebels against her controlling father.
filmography.plot: A wealthy doctor's son decides to practice medicine in a slum area, defying his father's wishes.

filmography.title: Down Among the Sheltering Palms
filmography.role_description: A journalist who causes trouble for American occupation forces on a Pacific island.
filmography.plot: Two army officers stationed on a Pacific island try to fraternize with the local women against regulations.

filmography.title: Yes Sir That's My Baby
filmography.role_description: A wife and mother who rebels against her football-playing husband's neglect.
filmography.plot: Five ex-GIs juggle college, football, and fatherhood.

filmography.title: The Girl Rush
filmography.role_description: A gambler's daughter trying to make her way in Las Vegas.
filmography.plot: A woman inherits a half-interest in a Las Vegas hotel, but finds it's not the jackpot she expected.

filmography.title: Between Two Women
filmography.role_description: A nightclub singer who becomes a patient of Dr. Kildare.
filmography.plot: Dr. Kildare treats a nightclub singer who is starving herself and helps a fellow doctor with a romantic problem.

filmography.title: Thousands Cheer
filmography.role_description: Appears as herself performing a musical number in this wartime morale booster.
filmography.plot: An aerialist puts his career on hold to join the army, where he falls for the colonel's daughter.

filmography.title: Broadway Rhythm
filmography.role_description: A performer in a musical about a producer looking for a new star.
filmography.plot: A Broadway producer wants a movie star for his new show, but his family wants him to use a different actress.

filmography.title: Keeping Company
filmography.role_description: One of the daughters in a family drama about marriage and relationships.
filmography.plot: A real estate agent and his wife deal with the romantic entanglements of their three daughters.

filmography.title: Susan and God
filmography.role_description: The teenage daughter of a friend of the main character.
filmography.plot: A society woman returns from Europe with a new religious fervor, trying to convert her friends and family.

filmography.title: The Penalty
filmography.role_description: The granddaughter of a gangster who tries to reform him.
filmography.plot: The son of a gangster tries to hide his father's identity and turn him away from crime.

filmography.title: Modern Times
filmography.role_description: An uncredited role as the younger sister of Paulette Goddard's character.
filmography.plot: The Tramp struggles to live in modern industrial society with the help of a young homeless woman.

filmography.title: Won Ton Ton: The Dog Who Saved Hollywood
filmography.role_description: A cameo appearance in this comedy about Old Hollywood.
filmography.plot: A dog becomes a major movie star in the 1920s, but his human friends struggle with the studio system.
